chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
w: world
this: nid
s2: state
s1: state

Goal:
network_step s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2

Premises:
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (gets s l)] : world -> Pred state
Inductive network_step (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getp l))), st \In get_st l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getp l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to;
Idle : forall s1 s2 : state, s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step s1 s2
SendMsg : forall (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getp l))), st \In get_st l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getp l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step s1 s2
network_step_sind : forall (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
CohUn : forall (w1 w2 : world) (s1 s2 : state), Coh w1 s1 -> Coh w2 s2 -> valid (w1 \+ w2) -> Coh (w1 \+ w2) (s1 \+ s2)
ReceiveMsg : forall (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getp l))), rt \In get_rt l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getp l) (gets s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (gets s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step s1 s2
cohW : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid w
cohH : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> hook_complete w
Coh0 : forall (w : world) (s : state), w = Unit -> s = Unit -> Coh w s
cohD : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> dom w =i dom s
unit_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> w = Unit < -> s = Unit
coh_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state) (l : Label), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (gets s l)
cohS : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid s
coh_s : forall (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getp l) (gets s l)
Coh_dom : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (gets s l)) =i nodes (getp l) (gets s l)
hook_complete = fun w : world => hooks_consistent w w : world -> Prop
coh_prec : forall w : world, precise (Coh w)
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
send_step_t = Transitions.send_step_t : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments send_step_t _%function_scope

```coq
intros s1 s2 H.
induction H using network_step_ind.
- intros. split; trivial.
- intros. split.
  * apply CohUn with w w; trivial.
    apply cohW; trivial.
  * apply CohUn with w w; trivial.
    apply cohW; trivial.
- intros. split.
  * apply CohUn with w w; trivial.
    apply cohW; trivial.
  * apply CohUn with w w; trivial.
    apply cohW; trivial.
Qed.```

original: intros s1 s2 H. induction H using network_step_ind. - intros. split; trivial. - intros. split. * apply CohUn with w w; trivial. apply cohW; trivial. * apply CohUn with w w; trivial. apply cohW; trivial. - intros. split. * apply CohUn with w w; trivial. apply cohW; trivial. * apply CohUn with w w; trivial. apply cohW; trivial.
